ygData.subject: Re: faction
ygData.msgSnippet: update... i just read a post on stratics that says u can lose faction on all of the servers by killing other PC s (ie. duels).  it says after 5-7 PC kills,
ygData.messageBody:
update... i just read a post on stratics that says u can lose faction on all
of the servers by killing other PC's (ie. duels). it says after 5-7 PC
kills, their faction standing went from indifferent to dubious. A few more,
and they will be KOS (threatingly is after dubious, and they will attack if
conned threatingly).

Sinlaru


-----Original Message-----
From: Tom Bratina <gbratina@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, June 20, 1999 6:49 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] faction


>From: "Tom Bratina" <gbratina@...>
>
>yes, u can lose faction and be KOS in neriak. in fact, on the PvP server,
>they put in a faction system that really sux. many ppl cannot go back to
>their home towns. even in duels and guild wars, u lose faction.
>
>Sinlaru Ce`alen
>Rallos Zek
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Kelly P. Lewandowski <4x4rednecks@...>
>To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>Date: Sunday, June 20, 1999 1:53 PM
>Subject: [eq_wizards] faction
>
>
>>From: "Kelly P. Lewandowski" <4x4rednecks@...>
>>
>>Off topic:
>>
>>I am a dark elf wizard
>>does any one know if you can lose enough faction with the neriak guards so
>>that they KOS you,
>>and if they do at about what lvl would this happen.
>>
>>If you kill 5 orcs you can go by the guards at freeport and they look at
>you
>>dubiously. Appreciate
>>any responses.
>>
>>
>>
>>BloodShadow lvl 8
>>Veeshan
>>
>>
